outline:
1. to move, go, turn back, move away, backslide
    1. (Qal) to backslide, prove recreant to
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to turn oneself away, turn back
      2. to be turned or driven back, be repulsed
kjv_def: backslider, drive, go back, turn (away, back).
strongs_def: properly, to flinch, i.e. (by implication) to go back, literally (to retreat) or figuratively (to apostatize)
